What We Do

Nothing is off the shelf – it's all engineered for you.

Suspension Setup

Track, race, or road – we dial in your suspension to match your driving style and application. Data-driven setup using professional testing equipment.

Learn More →

Custom Valving

We're not all the same. Suspension and handling is subjective. Have your dampers valved specifically for YOU – your weight, your style, your preferences.

Learn More →

Chassis Engineering

Complete chassis setup and development. From geometry optimisation to corner weighting – we make your car work as a complete system.

Learn More →

Caterham Specialist

Over 30 years owning, racing, and developing Caterhams. Bespoke builds, GSXR conversions, and complete engineering services for the Seven.

Learn More →

Our Philosophy

Communication. It has to be about communication.

We listen to our customers' needs and develop a product or solution together. Whether you're chasing lap times or seeking the perfect road setup, we work with you to understand exactly what you need.

With great IT and testing equipment, we're leading the way on service provision in the sector. Relaxed but professional – that's how we work.
